H0.text: when the atlanta braves won the world series. 1991

H1.text: when the atlanta braves won the world series. 1993

H2.text: when the atlanta braves won the world series. 1996

H3.text: when the atlanta braves won the world series. 1995 World Series

A4.text: The Braves reached the World Series in 1996 and were defeated by the New York Yankees.

A5.text: The Braves rebounded in 1995, defeating the Cleveland Indians to win the World Series.
